briefTitle: Safety, Tolerability And On-Body Temperature Of A Disposable Heatwrap Device For The Lower Back
officialTitle: An Open Label Study To Evaluate The Safety, Tolerability And On-Body Temperature Of A Disposable Heatwrap Device For The Lower Back
summary: The objectives of this study are to evaluate the dermal safety and on-body temperature of a disposable heatwrap product when worn while in a supine position for five consecutive days. The product will be worn on the back for approximately 8 hours per 24 hour period.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With a Significant Skin Event (Day 5 Cumulative)
